runs.comm: a length ball pitching outside off stump and swinging further away from the right-hander, Hafeez chases without moving his feet and is beaten
similarly played, flicked back to the bowler on the front foot
a little step down the wicket but flicked only to square leg
pushed off the front foot on the off side
Nazir moves forward and defends on the off side, the length was good and the line on off stump
full ball on off stump, Nazir drives from his crease to cover. Tidy start from Mills, should have had a wicket
bowled on middle and off from round the wicket, Hafeez defends on the front foot
up and over! Hafeez steps out of his crease, gets under the ball and lofts it cleanly over the long-on boundary
a bit too close to cut from outside off stump, plays it towards short third man
cut off the back foot towards point
flatter and quicker ball, Hafeez moves forward and drives a low full toss
played wide of mid-on, where Franklin runs to his right and dives to cut off the shot
played off the pads behind square and that's Nazir's first run
strays on to the pads but Hafeez misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, the ball goes towards square leg
splendid timing, Nazir goes back to a length delivery and punches the ball through the gap at cover. Not much wrong with that ball but he connected superbly
this time he goes airborne, lofting the ball off his pads towards cow corner, Nazir didn't make perfect contact and the ball falls safely in the deep
defended on the front foot towards the off side
he beats the man on the square leg boundary, placing the shot to the right of the fielder. The ball was short and Nazir pulled it
strays down leg side with his first ball
good length outside off, Nazir moves forward and plays towards cover
Southee appeals after hitting the pads with a delivery that angles into the right-hander, Hafeez tried to play to square leg but missed, that ball was perhaps missing leg stump
shortish ball around off stump, Hafeez punches the ball from his crease through midwicket and finds the gap, the timing on it is good as well
another short ball and Hafeez pulls hard, sending the ball racing towards deep square leg, where Nicol runs to his right and slides to save the boundary
Nazir tries to whip the ball off his pads but the length is too full, Southee appeals once again but the impact was a touch high on the front pad
full ball on middle stump, turned towards midwicket for a single
played off the front foot towards cover

Nazir steps down the pitch and slashes, aiming to whack the ball over the off side, he gets a thick edge that flies over where first slip would have been. The ball was short of a length and outside off stump
this is a better shot, a short-arm pull that sends the short of a length ball racing to the backward square leg boundary
Oram responds with a slower ball that is nudged towards midwicket
full ball outside off stump, Hafeez moves forward and drives the ball in the air and over the in field at cover, Oram's first over is going terribly
Hafeez misses the glance but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye behind square

Southee makes his third appeal and once again it is unsuccessful, Hafeez tried to swivel and pull but the ball was not short enough. The impact was too high on the pad, I think. In fact the ball hit the back thigh
shorter length and this time Hafeez connects with the pull, hitting the ball to deep square leg

Nazir backs away towards leg to try and hit through cover, the ball is full and straight. Nazir ends up driving straight and beats the bowler and mid-off. I suspect the ball hit the inside half of the bat

caught and bowled! Nazir's pushed the ball off the front foot right back to Southee, who takes the catch on his follow through. New Zealand have snapped a strong opening stand. Southee caught the ball at chest height to his left
too straight, Jamshed gets going with a nice clip off the back foot, placed wide of the fielder at mid-on
full length on the pads, Jamshed clips the ball neatly towards deep midwicket
Hafeez jumps down the pitch to drive Nathan McCullum's first ball through extra cover

tremendous shot! It's gone all the way for six over extra cover! Jamshed just got under the ball and drove in the air and far enough over the boundary. It looked minimalistic. Lovely use of the wrists.
played towards midwicket for one more
dug out behind point for a single
nudged off the pads through midwicket
Hafeez steps out of his crease and then defends
full ball on middle and off, Jamshed stays in his crease and drives towards cover point
good length outside off, driven towards wide mid-off for a single
another full ball outside off, Jamshed square drives past point but there's a fielder on the boundary
good length and straight, Hafeez works the ball off his pads through square leg
Hafeez was a bit early on the cut and got a bottom edge into the ground towards point
Jamshed has begun batting like a dream, he swivels against a short ball which is down leg side and pulls it over the fine leg boundary
Hafeez has carted the ball on to the grass banks at midwicket, it was a full toss and Hafeez swung across the line and swung hard
quick ball on off stump, Hafeez dabs towards short third man
driven towards long off for a single
another six, this time inside out over extra cover. Jamshed moved towards leg stump, got under the ball and drove it just over the boundary
defended on the leg side
nudged from the crease towards midwicket, McCullum bowled that flat and quick
bowled quick and straight from round the wicket, dabbed on the off side
Jamshed charges Vettori and drives a low full toss back towards the bowler
flat and fast, Jamshed sweeps and hits the ball to deep backward square
full ball outside off stump, Hafeez plays the square drive to deep point
quick ball just outside of, Hafeez cuts towards short third man and runs after a bit of hesitation
driven through cover point for a single
good length ball outside off, Jamshed steers towards point where Franklin makes a good save
Jamshed carves the ball with his wrists over point and finds the gap on the boundary, he had width outside off and he went hard at the ball
played towards point once again
Franklin collected the ball at point and had a shy at the striker's end, the throw was poor and the fielder on the deep midwicket boundary Rob Nicol had a lot of sliding and saving to do

Nicol's palmed the ball for six over the deep square leg boundary! New Zealand are having a shocker in the field! Jamshed pulled the short ball hard and flat and straight to Nicol. He had his hands over his head and the ball bounced off them
steered towards third man
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
played to long on for a single
Jamshed steps out of his crease and drives the ball to long on
Hafeez mis-times the slog sweep along the ground through midwicket, the pace was slower from Vettori
Jamshed makes room by moving outside leg and swings the ball towards deep midwicket, gets to the fielder on the bounce
driven firmly but straight to the fielder on the edge of the circle at cover
good length and straight, Jamshed defends on the off side
full ball on the pads, dangerous line to bowl when the fine leg is in the circle, the batsman clips it to Vettori in that position
slower ball outside off stump, Hafeez waits and steers to third man
this is surgical placement from Jamshed. He's flicked the ball to the right of the fielder at midwicket and to the left of the man at long-on. Terrific batting
pushed into the off side and that's his fifty, it's been magnificent to watch and he's put Pakistan on course for 200
short ball and Hafeez pulls towards deep square leg
Hafeez gets down on one knee and chips the ball towards long leg, where Oram tumbles and fields after running from deep backward square leg
Vettori fumbles at short third man to allow Hafeez to run after playing the late cut
Jamshed makes room and drives the ball to the fielder at cover
that's very wide down leg side, Hafeez swung at it but couldn't connect
bowled him! Hafeez swung across the line at a length ball and just missed it. Franklin hit off stump
full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot to long off
Jamshed works the ball towards long on and keeps strike
he's smashed it back towards Oram who sticks out his right hand and stops the ball
he moves towards the off side and pulls the ball in front of square leg
Akmal pulls a short ball towards cow corner, giving Williamson a long chase from long-on. Williamson does will to get there, slide and tumble and make the save
a short ball and it's been called a wide for height, that's a tough call. Akmal had let it go
Akmal's hacked at the ball and carved it high in the air towards the fielder who is several yards in on the cover boundary, the catch is taken safely this time by Nicol
flicked off the pads towards long on
the slower ball outside off stump, Jamshed had moved outside leg and was beaten as he tried to reach for it
Umar Akmal's first ball is a straight full toss, which he drives to long off
another low full toss, driven to long off where Nathan McCullum fumbles, but no extra run is taken
worked off the pads through square leg

caught at long on! Jamshed made room and lofted Vettori towards the boundary. Nathan McCullum had to run to his left and he got there quickly, tumbling to the ground after taking the catch. He seems to have hurt himself. New Zealand are clawing back now
nudged off the pads through square leg for a single
another full toss and Malik plays it back to the bowler
Akmal moved towards the off side, got down low to scoop, and turned his head away as he made contact. He made good contact, scooping the ball over the fielder at short fine leg
a delicate late dab this time against a length ball outside off, placing it fine enough to reach the third man boundary
full ball on off stump, played towards extra cover
a mis-timed loft towards long on, the ball falls well short of the fielder
dabbed towards third man off the back foot
short of a length outside off, steered off the back foot to short third man
full and straight, Malik drives and hits the ball in front of square leg
another very full ball around off stump, steered towards third man
Malik has a slog and mis-timed the ball towards long-on, Southee's line and length has been un-hittable so far in this over
a full ball in the blockhole wide outside off stump, Akmal made room and then wasn't in a position to play any sort of shot
superb ball, in the blockhole and very wide outside off stump but not wide enough to be called a wide, Akmal can't play a shot
another blockhole delivery to end an excellent over, Akmal plays it back to the bowler
Malik backs away outside leg stump and then dabs the ball from leg stump towards short third man. Oram followed the batsman as he tried to make room
Akmal's got under a length ball, leaning towards the off side and lofting the ball into the gap between midwicket and long-on
Southee's good work is being frittered away, Akmal gives Oram the charge, getting under another length ball and carting it over the long off boundary
this time he's been caught at long on! Akmal tried to clear the straight boundary again but couldn't get the ball over Nathan McCullum
short and wide outside off stump, Afridi cuts the ball between short third man and backward point and finds the boundary
a full toss and Afridi was a bit late on the swing, hitting it towards long on
it doesn't start well for Southee, Malik goes back in his crease to get under the length of the ball and drives it in the air and into the gap on the extra cover boundary
in the blockhole on middle stump, Malik swings the ball on the leg side
wide outside off stump, just inside the tram line, Afridi had cleared his front foot to hit on the leg side and he couldn't play the ball
in the blockhole outside off stump, Afridi digs it out and drives through cover, Williamson fumbles the pick up and they run a second
that's on the tramline wide outside off stump, and the umpire's called it a wide
Afridi's ready for the ball outside off stump this time and he bashes it flat and wide of the fielder at long off, one-bounce four
Afridi throws his bat at a length ball outside off and hits it in the air towards deep cover, where Williamson moves in to take the catch
